ideas.name: Desktop Kanban
ideas.description: This is a program I developed in Electron with React. This allowed me to build a desktop application utilizing modern web technologies. It was compatiable with both Windows, and Mac OS.

ideas.name: Time Guru
ideas.description: Time-Guru is my personal project to enable remote users to have an easy way to keep track of tasks, and time management. This is done with the MERN stack.

ideas.name: Foam Solutions
ideas.description: This was probably one of the most complex sites I have ever built. Not because of the development, but the design was extremely complex for me. With it being such a unique type of website.

ideas.name: Northern Contracting
ideas.description: NCC is one of the first public client sites I have done. I built it using React, but had a deadline of 2 days. So I had to come up with the design, and develop the site in under 2 days.
